bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon w/E2 tapered head tube, BB95 bottom bracket, Carbon Armor, G2 Geometry

components.description: RockShox Reba RL 29 w/Solo Air, Motion Control remote lockout, rebound, 15mm Maxle, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 100mm travel
Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 15mm alloy axle front hub; Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, alloy axle rear hub w/Bontrager AT-850 32-hole double-walled rims
Bontrager Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Cane Creek IS-3, E2, alloy cartridge
